name: Vox.io
description:
VOX.IO is an additive arcade game where the player takes control of a tornado bent on consuming all of the surroundings.  Start small is grow your power and devour all. 

  • Beware of the rouge tornadoes chasing after you. 
  • Devour the city to grow in size and destroy your rivals.
  • Get as large as you can as fast as you can.
